articles.author: The Modern Ferret
articles.description:
Here is a book my mom made when she was around 10 (the same age as the kid I now mentor through Royal Family Kids). My mom loved animals just like I do and just like my mentee does. I feel like she could’ve handed me this same hand-written book yesterday!
Losing my mom unexpectedly has not been an easy journey but I am grateful for the community I have to share these special things with.
I am also grateful that through the tears, Elijah is right next to me, sniffing the contents of this box.(Feed generated with FetchRSS)
articles.title: Photos from The Modern Ferret's post

articles.author: The Modern Ferret
articles.description:
If I were to start doing outreach with ferrets again at local schools, assisted living facilities for the elderly, and mental health homes, would any of you guys be interested in supporting this project monthly? This is something I've wanted to do for probably ten years but I wouldn't be able to do it alone. 
P.S. My friend recently made me a logo to show her support!!(Feed generated with FetchRSS)

articles.description: For those who know about my Gobi bear, I would like to inform you a week ago I took him to vet bc he seemed sick & was put on medicine & ever since then he has lost a pound, walking:running & not sliding, & caught him on their couch so he’s jumping too! So happy he is himself again!
